description: Michael Soldier convinces Will Clark to suck and rim Tony Scalia, who in turn is gobbling Rusty Samuels' pendulous pale putz. Meanwhile,bald-pated sex-monkey Lance Gear is pounding the bejesus out ofErik Michaels. Cut back to Soldier, who is now driving Clark to get bizon Peter Raeg's butthole. More sucking, fucking and rimming ensues,followed by the boys dropping their viscous cargo one by one onClark, who has been fitted with a gas mask.
title: Red Star, Scene #04
